comments.creator: nemutagk@gmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US) AppleWebKit/534.16 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/10.0.648.151 Safari/534.16
Build Identifier: Firefox 4.0

The all text enclosed in strong label looks bad, the space between letters is null, dificult to read, even text that uses the CSS property "font-weight: bold" looks bad, this error is only shown on some websites such as Twitter, Mozilla Add-ons section, http://twitpic.com

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Only display the web page
Actual Results:  
Incorrectly displays web page
